title: RAMMUS REWORK
body: I AM A{{champion:33}}   MAIN WITH MASTERY 6 ON HIM, HE IS KIT OK AN ALL THAT IN JUNGLE MODE BUT I STRONGLY BELIEVE THAT THEIR IS  MORE THAT CAN BE DONE TO HIS OVERALL KIT HE HAS POTENTIAL DO BE A GREAT CHAMP I JUST THINK THAT RAMMUS TRULY DESERVE A REWORK AN SKIN&PATRICLE CHANGES ALL LOT OF RAMMUS MAIN WOULD LOVE IT.

replies.body:
He is fine for now.
New season he will be incredibly weak though.
Start looking for new mains until they give him a minor buff.
i dont thnk so bcuz those mastery is going to mke him even more dope plus my fill tire 3 scaling armor rune page n items mke him op so idk i thnk he will be even strnger for me.

Rammus is a pretty dope champ. I encourage you to leave this feedback on the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) where stuff like this is meant to go.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
YEA THANKS MUCH THIS IS LIKE MY FIRST EVER POST AND YEA I DIDN'T REALLY KNOW.
